name: @arpitmalik832/eslint-config
description: Custom ESLint configuration for JavaScript/TypeScript projects
author: Arpit Malik

scripts.preinstall: if [ "$SKIP_PREINSTALL" != "true" ]; then node -e "if(process.env.npm_execpath.indexOf('pnpm') === -1) throw new Error('You must use pnpm to install dependencies')"; else echo 'Skipping preinstall script'; fi
scripts.build: pnpm rm-dist && pnpm rm-types && pnpm build-common && cross-env APP_ENV=staging LIB_ENV=staging rollup -c rollup.config.js && pnpm generate-declarations
scripts.build:visualizer: pnpm rm-dist && pnpm rm-types && pnpm build-common && cross-env APP_ENV=staging LIB_ENV=staging INCLUDE_VISUALIZER=true rollup -c rollup.config.js && pnpm generate-declarations
scripts.build:buildStats: pnpm rm-dist && pnpm rm-types && pnpm build-common && cross-env APP_ENV=staging LIB_ENV=staging INCLUDE_BUILD_STATS=true rollup -c rollup.config.js && pnpm generate-declarations
scripts.build:visualizer:buildStats: pnpm rm-dist && pnpm rm-types && pnpm build-common && cross-env APP_ENV=staging LIB_ENV=staging INCLUDE_VISUALIZER=true INCLUDE_BUILD_STATS=true rollup -c rollup.config.js && pnpm generate-declarations
scripts.build:beta: pnpm rm-dist && pnpm rm-types && pnpm build-common && cross-env APP_ENV=staging LIB_ENV=beta rollup -c rollup.config.js && pnpm generate-declarations
scripts.build:beta:visualizer: pnpm rm-dist && pnpm rm-types && pnpm build-common && cross-env APP_ENV=staging LIB_ENV=beta INCLUDE_VISUALIZER=true rollup -c rollup.config.js && pnpm generate-declarations
scripts.build:beta:buildStats: pnpm rm-dist && pnpm rm-types && pnpm build-common && cross-env APP_ENV=staging LIB_ENV=beta INCLUDE_BUILD_STATS=true rollup -c rollup.config.js && pnpm generate-declarations
scripts.build:beta:visualizer:buildStats: pnpm rm-dist && pnpm rm-types && pnpm build-common && cross-env APP_ENV=staging LIB_ENV=beta INCLUDE_VISUALIZER=true INCLUDE_BUILD_STATS=true rollup -c rollup.config.js && pnpm generate-declarations
scripts.build:prod: pnpm rm-dist && pnpm rm-types && pnpm build-common && cross-env APP_ENV=staging LIB_ENV=production rollup -c rollup.config.js && pnpm generate-declarations
scripts.build:prod:visualizer: pnpm rm-dist && pnpm rm-types && pnpm build-common && cross-env APP_ENV=staging LIB_ENV=production INCLUDE_VISUALIZER=true rollup -c rollup.config.js && pnpm generate-declarations
scripts.build:prod:buildStats: pnpm rm-dist && pnpm rm-types && pnpm build-common && cross-env APP_ENV=staging LIB_ENV=production INCLUDE_BUILD_STATS=true rollup -c rollup.config.js && pnpm generate-declarations
scripts.build:prod:visualizer:buildStats: pnpm rm-dist && pnpm rm-types && pnpm build-common && cross-env APP_ENV=staging LIB_ENV=production INCLUDE_VISUALIZER=true INCLUDE_BUILD_STATS=true rollup -c rollup.config.js && pnpm generate-declarations
scripts.storybook: pnpm build && cross-env APP_ENV=staging LIB_ENV=staging STORY_ENV=development storybook dev -p 6006
scripts.storybook:visualizer: pnpm build && cross-env APP_ENV=staging LIB_ENV=staging STORY_ENV=development INCLUDE_VISUALIZER=true storybook dev -p 6006
scripts.storybook:buildStats: pnpm build && cross-env APP_ENV=staging LIB_ENV=staging STORY_ENV=development INCLUDE_BUILD_STATS=true storybook dev -p 6006
scripts.storybook:visualizer:buildStats: pnpm build && cross-env APP_ENV=staging LIB_ENV=staging STORY_ENV=development INCLUDE_VISUALIZER=true INCLUDE_BUILD_STATS=true storybook dev -p 6006
scripts.storybook:build: pnpm build && cross-env APP_ENV=staging LIB_ENV=staging STORY_ENV=staging storybook build
scripts.storybook:build:visualizer: pnpm build && cross-env APP_ENV=staging LIB_ENV=staging STORY_ENV=staging INCLUDE_VISUALIZER=true storybook build
scripts.storybook:build:buildStats: pnpm build && cross-env APP_ENV=staging LIB_ENV=staging STORY_ENV=staging INCLUDE_BUILD_STATS=true storybook build
scripts.storybook:build:visualizer:buildStats: pnpm build && cross-env APP_ENV=staging LIB_ENV=staging STORY_ENV=staging INCLUDE_VISUALIZER=true INCLUDE_BUILD_STATS=true storybook build

scripts.storybook:build:prod: pnpm build && cross-env APP_ENV=staging LIB_ENV=production STORY_ENV=production storybook build
